Articles.Content: **Edited <time datetime="2018-11-09T02:20:55Z" title="11/09/2018 02:20  AM" data-short="5 yr">November 9, 2018</time> by Thingymajigy**
Looks very sleek and smooth, nice job ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Good job mate, sparrowhawk is the home of beautifull replicas!
So beautiful with so few parts! Love it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

You know, you can try re-rooting the part to the drone so that we won't have to do the whole control-from-here thing ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> You know, you can try re-rooting the part to the drone so that we won't have to do the whole control-from-here thing ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I wish that would work ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Oh and by the looks of the downloads, people seem to realising that BD armory has updated...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-15T06:46:25Z" title="05/15/2015 06:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 15, 2015</time> by Thingymajigy**

> 
> I wish that would work ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> Oh and by the looks of the downloads, people seem to realising that BD armory has updated...

So it doesn't work? .\_\_. 

Most just click download by reflex xD

> 
> So it doesn't work? .\_\_.

No it doesn't. Only time when it will automatically control from the probe is when you launch it with no-one on board

Hi !

Really great plane , easy control ( even without use "control from here" make nice barrel roll ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) )

& i like the cargo bay as bomb storage ( prevent unintended fire )

Maybe Turbojet drain fuel too fast . But there's Turbojet after all !

Congratz !
